name: Web App UI Lite Design System
description:
Explore the entire library


Web App UI Lite Figma Design system

A Figma design system for web apps created for product designers, product managers and startups.


Design solutions, build customer value and deliver projects lightning fast.


With more non-designers joining the fun in Figma, a well-organized, easy-to-use component library and UI kit is crucial for cross-team collaboration. Work in tandem with designers, validate ideas more efficiently, and plan product roadmaps with confidence.


Summary

  • 140+ Responsive Components with auto layout and variant support
  • 80+ Library Styles including text sizes, colors and effects.
  • 100+ icons in two sizes.


Components:

  • Button
  • Radio
  • Checkbox
  • Switch
  • Slider
  • Stepper
  • Tag
  • Input
  • Dropdown
  • Tag Input
  • Text Area
  • Date Picker
  • Tooltip
  • Progress
  • Badge
  • Divider
  • Popover
  • Toast
  • Modal
  • Pagination
  • Accordion
  • Menus
  • Scrollbar
  • Blank and Basic Cards


Explore the entire library
